name: Merry-Go-Madness and The Claw Of Survival
name_original: Merry-Go-Madness and The Claw Of Survival
description:
Merry-Go-Madness and The Claw Of Survival

Trapped on a Merry-Go-Round armed only your trusty grabber-claw, how long can you survive?

Steal hotdogs and popcorn to stay alive, and try to beat your top score by pocketing cash along the way, but be careful!

If you don't watch your hunger you might stave, especially with all the babies you keep accidentally nabbing eating all your rations. Then there's the police to watch out for, they've been particularily trigger happy lately.

---

Made for the Ludem Dare Game Jam #47

Controls:

  • Shoot claw - left click or SPACE bar

Credits:

Game design and programming by Alexander Byatt & Steve de Niese

Art & animation: Alexander Byatt (Byazzle) 
Music: Steve de Niese (LetterAfterZ)
